snippet.title: Charlie, The Steak - Teaser
snippet.description:
Charlie, The Steak Official teaser is finally out!
 
Get more info about the game here: http://www.dynamicdust.com/charliethesteak
 
Are you just feeling angry all the time and you have an urge to just punch someone in the face? Well, we've got a perfect -- almost non-violent -- solution for you! We are proudly bringing you -- the one and only -- scapegoat called Charlie. Don't worry, he's not a real person nor he is a living creature. He is a steak!
 
 A lean, juicy, red-blooded steak. No matter how angry you are at your teacher, mother or boss, he will be able to relieve your anger and ease your stress. You will punch him, cut him, hurt him in every various and the most creative ways possible -- safely from your mobile device. Isn't that just great?
 
This game is coming soon to all your iOS devices, so stay tuned and make sure to LIKE our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/DynamicDustOfficial and FOLLOW our Twitter: https://twitter.com/DynamicDust so you won't miss any important news from us.
